title: AI and ML Use Cases in Urban Mobility

quizzes.question: What is the primary focus of the Demand Forecasting in Shared Mobility Services lesson?
options: Managing shared fleets and responding to user demand
quizzes.explanation: The lesson on Demand Forecasting in Shared Mobility Services focuses on how AI helps manage shared fleets and better respond to user demand.

quizzes.question: How do AI-driven Smart Traffic Light Systems benefit urban areas?
options: By reducing the need for human traffic controllers
By easing congestion and improving traffic flow
By enhancing communication between autonomous vehicles
quizzes.explanation: AI-driven Smart Traffic Light Systems are designed to ease congestion and improve traffic flow in busy cities.

quizzes.question: What is the role of AI in Urban Freight and Last Mile Delivery Optimization?
options: To detect risks and improve cyclist safety
To improve deliveries and solve urban logistics challenges
To create virtual models of cities
quizzes.explanation: In Urban Freight and Last Mile Delivery Optimization, AI is used to improve deliveries and solve urban logistics challenges.

quizzes.question: Which lesson discusses the use of AI in enhancing cycling safety?
quizzes.explanation: The lesson on AI Cycling Safety Applications focuses on how AI protects cyclists by detecting risks and improving safety in real time.
